title: Dua Against Enemy
description: Authentic supplications for Dua Against Enemy
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Dua Against Enemy. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 131
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ مُنْزِلَ الْكِتَابِ، سَرِيعَ الْحِسَابِ، اهْزِمِ الأَحْزَابَ، اللَّهُمَّ اهزِمْهُمْ وَزَلْزِلْهُمْ)).
items.transliteration: Allahumma munzilal-kitab, sareeAAal-hisab, ihzimil-ahzab, allahummah-zimhum wazalzilhum.
items.translation: O Allah, Revealer of the Book, Swift at reckoning, defeat the confederates. O Allah, defeat them and convulse them.
